alert.note: Alert for Burns BLM (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 17 at 9:05AM PDT until August 17 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR SCATTERED LIGHTNING IN THE BURNS BLM AND SOUTHERN IDAHO HIGHLANDS... .Thunderstorms will move in from the south this afternoon and evening. Initial storms may start and spread new fires due to lightning, gusty winds, and little rain. Later storms will be wetter. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM MDT /1 PM PDT/ THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT MDT /11 PM PDT/ TONIGHT FOR LIGHTNING FOR SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS AND BURNS BLM...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 426 AND 636... The National Weather Service in Boise has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 2 PM MDT /1 PM PDT/ this afternoon to midnight MDT /11 PM PDT/ tonight. * THUNDERSTORMS...Scattered coverage. New fire starts are possible with initial storms. later storms will be wetter. * OUTFLOW WINDS...Up to 50 mph in initial storms, 35 mph in later storms.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will occur shortly.
